properties.name: Hormuz Island, Qeshm County, Hormozgan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Hormuz Island, Qeshm County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Type: 187

Location: Iran

Island in the Strait of Hormuz, 8 kilometres off the Iranian coast. Evaporitic rocks including a nearly circular-shaped salt plug (with solution caverns) exposed at the surface with a maximum length of 7 km along its east-west axis. Hematite ore is...

properties.name: Qalat Payeen, Bandar Abbas County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Qalat Payeen, Bandar Abbas County, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Type: 274

Location: Iran
